imdb.title: Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi
imdb.plot: "Weak Legs" Kenichi Shirahama would rather spend his time reading self improvement books than fighting.

episodes.title: Hard vs. Soft! The Siblings Quarrel After the Long Separation
episodes.plot: When Kensei Ma starts acting suspiciously, Kenichi decides to follow him and learn his secrets.

episodes.title: The Assault Commander Joins In! Restaurant Scuffle
episodes.plot: The Shinpaku Alliance is weakened, surrounded, and outnumbered by the Ragnarok gang. When he learns of their plight, Kenichi drops everything to return home. But the young fighter worries if he can reach his friends in time.

episodes.title: What Fear, Seig! Prelude for Destruction
episodes.plot: Niijima is captured while spying. Miu and a reluctant Kenichi rush to his resuce, but wonder if they're headed into a trap.

episodes.title: The Results of Training! Align Forward Half!
episodes.plot: As he and Miu try to save Niijima, Kenichi finds himself locked in a fierce battle with Siegfried, who has a reputation for being unbeatable.

episodes.title: Honoka Will Help You!
episodes.plot: Hermit returns for another round against Kenichi, but someone unexpected gets in his way.

episodes.title: Honoka's in Danger! Loki's Plot!
episodes.plot: Intense training nearly breaks Kenichi and he decides to run away. But when Hermit learns Honoka is Kenichi's sister, Loki takes the girl hostage and lures her brother into a deadly battle to save her.

episodes.title: Strike, Kenichi! Fists Do the Talking!
episodes.plot: Honoka has been kidnapped, and Kenichi must take down Hermit to rescue her. Then he learns a dark secret from his enemy's past.

episodes.title: Don't Give In! The Words Left by a Loved One!
episodes.plot: Kenichi's battle against Hermit comes to an abrupt halt when Loki puts a knife to Honoka's throat. With his sister's life on the line, Kenichi finds himself rendered helpless.

episodes.title: There's No One in Our Way! Now Is the Time to Settle the Fight!
episodes.plot: Hermit can't abide Loki's threats against Honoka, and saves the girl by betraying Ragnarok. But nothing can stop his quest for revenge against Kenichi, and their battle rages anew.

episodes.title: Miu vs. renka! the love triangle creates a storm!
episodes.plot: Kensei Ma's tough-as-nails daughter, Renka, arrives at the dojo. But when her feelings for Kenichi become apparent, Miu gets jealous.

episodes.title: Dangerous Trap! Let's Have Sumo Chanko Stew Together!
episodes.plot: Kenichi learns about a Ragnarok's secret lair and, tired of waiting for the next attack from his enemies, decides to take matters into his own hands.

episodes.title: Cute Kitten! Hand-to-Hand Battle Against Women!
episodes.plot: Kisara's soft spot for kittens may be her undoing as she teams with enemies to help a feline in need.

episodes.title: The Place the Promise Was Made! Everything Started Here!
episodes.plot: Kenichi learns he and an enemy are connected by a shared past.

episodes.title: Terror of the Sphere of Control! A Dragon Descends!
episodes.plot: Despite their common past, Odin refuses to let Kenichi escape without a fight. Meanwhile Niijima attempts to get Hermit into the Shinpaku Alliance.

episodes.title: Elder's Super Express! Do-or-die Secluded Tour in the Mountains!
episodes.plot: The Elder agrees to train Kenichi personally if the young fighter can survive a treacherous test. Meanwhile Niijima receives unexpected help.

episodes.title: Limiter! invitation to the world of bloodshed!
episodes.plot: When his training in the mountains puts him in peril, Kenichi is rescued by a mysterious stranger. He soon discovers this stranger may hold the key to his destiny.

episodes.title: Collapse of the Shinpaku Federation! The Crazy Fist Stealthily Approaches!
episodes.plot: While Kenichi trains with the Elder, the Ragnarok leaders make a move back home.

episodes.title: The Decisive Attack! Kisara Dances!
episodes.plot: Chaos reigns as simultaneous battles put everyone in danger. Niijima, Kisara, and Miu go to combat with their deadliest foes.

episodes.title: Farewell! A Determined Niijima Joins the Fray!
episodes.plot: The Shinpaku Alliance is weakened, surrounded, and outnumbered by the Ragnarok gang. When he learns of their plight, Kenichi drops everything to return home. But the young fighter worries if he can reach his friends in time.

episodes.title: The Weakness of the Genius! Effort Surpasses Talent!
episodes.plot: Kenichi arrives to help his friends. But before he can take on his biggest enemy, Hermit steps in.

episodes.title: Showdown Between the Leaders! The Man with the Legendary Spear!
episodes.plot: It's the fight everyone has been waiting for: Kenichi versus Odin. But when the dojo's disciple starts to gain the upper hand, the First Fist of Ragnarok reveals an incredible and terrible power.

episodes.title: The Mightiest Transformation! The Ryozanpaku Rhythm!
episodes.plot: Kenichi is defenseless now that Odin can predict his every move. So instead of fighting his way, Kenichi decides to imitate the styles of his masters. Can his clever imitations keep Odin at bay?

episodes.title: The Mightiest Disciple, Kenichi!
episodes.plot: Kenichi's strategy is working against Odin, but then the Ragnarok leader turns to a new fearsome power that may destroy both of them.

episodes.title: The Place Where Heroes Gather
episodes.plot: Kenichi is off to a rough start during his first week of high school. His luck worsens when a bully challenges him to a fight. Now Kenichi must hone his fighting skills or risk getting pummeled.

episodes.title: The First Step! The Start of the Battle
episodes.plot: Kenichi receives an anonymous love letter, but decides his ongoing feelings for Miu mean he must turn down the secret admirer. On his way to meet her, however, he's forced to defend the Shinpaku Alliance from a Ragnarok threat.

episodes.title: Strength and Courage! For Protecting Justice
episodes.plot: Kenichi becomes the target of suspicion after displaying great skill and ability during his fight. Meanwhile, Miu proves herself as an athlete.

episodes.title: A Date? Must Move Forward!
episodes.plot: Kenichi's spirits are pretty low after so many fights. Luckily, the masters have a plan: in order to boost his spirits, the Ryozanpaku back-breakers are going to play match-maker!

episodes.title: A Day at Ryouzanpaku! The Dream on the Roof!
episodes.plot: After each win, Kenichi encouters an even stronger opponent. Soon the teenager decides to move in to the dojo to intensify his training.

episodes.title: Amazing Muscles! The Sensei's Secret
episodes.plot: An opponent increases the stakes of a fight when he brandishes a knife. Kenichi soon turns to a special trainer to learn about weapons. Will these lessons come in handy during round two?

episodes.title: Apapapa! Apachai's Training
episodes.plot: Apachai finally gets a chance to train Kenichi, and just in time - agents of Ragnarok are prowling the halls of his school, roughing up anyone unlucky enough to catch their eye.

episodes.title: Run Kenichi! A Boxer's Weakness
episodes.plot: Kenichi arrives to help his friends. But before he can take on his biggest enemy, Hermit steps in.

episodes.title: The Fist of Betrayal! Takeda's Sad Past
episodes.plot: As Kenichi continues his epic rooftop fight against Takeda, the young fighter learns a secret from his opponent's past.

episodes.title: A New Enemy! Tsuji Shinnosuke!
episodes.plot: Kenichi hoped he'd catch a break after defeating Takeda, but his victory reveals a new enemy wants him dead.

episodes.title: Honoka Sneaks In! Ryouzanpaku's Guest
episodes.plot: Hermit returns for another round against Kenichi, but someone unexpected gets in his way. Believe it or not, it's Kenichi's feisty little sister, Honoka!

episodes.title: Ryouzanpaku's Biggest Crisis!!?
episodes.plot: When Miu's teacher demands to know more about her living situation, the dojo members are forced to concoct a plan to fool her.

episodes.title: Protect the Sign! Attack on the Dojo!
episodes.plot: Everything's going great for Kenichi and Miu until a rival dojo attacks. Without the masters around, the two must face the intruders on their own.

episodes.title: Amusement??? To the Secret Furinji Island!
episodes.plot: The dojo gang embarks on a vacation. But fun turns into fear when the masters issue a challenge Kenichi isn't ready to take.

episodes.title: Ragnarok's Strongest! The Arrival of the Eight Fists!
episodes.plot: The leaders of the Ragnarok gang induct a new face to the organization's upper echelon. This can only mean trouble for Kenichi.

episodes.title: Takeda in Danger! The Rules of Revenge!
episodes.plot: Now part of the Eight Fists, Kisara is determined to eliminate those who deserted her. When Kenichi learns that Takeda is in danger, he offers his help.

episodes.title: Unforgiveable!! Kenichi's Fist of Fury!
episodes.plot: Kisara is determined to punish Takeda for his betrayal. Can Kenichi and Miu intervene in time?

episodes.title: Meet the Youth! New White Combination Formation!
episodes.plot: Niijima plans to create the Shinpaku Alliance, a personal army that will help him secure power in Japan and around the world. He wants Kenichi's help, but first he'll need to find the dojo.

episodes.title: Attack! The Neighboring Ryouzanpaku!
episodes.plot: Chaos reigns as simultaneous battles put everyone in danger. Niijima, Kisara, and Miu go to combat with their deadliest foes.

episodes.title: The Stolen Heart! Miu's Juliet!
episodes.plot: Kenichi becomes jealous when the handsome president of the drama club asks Miu to act in an production. But the young fighter will have to put this rivalry on hold if he's going to protect the club from new bullies.

episodes.title: Protect to the Death Kenichi! Miu's Lips
episodes.plot: Kenichi learns Kisara and her gang are heading to school to enact revenge on Miu during her stage debut.

episodes.title: The Mask Removed! Hermit's Real Identity
episodes.plot: Kenichi was determined to protect the drama club's play from Kisara, but the biggest threat may be the club president, Tanimoto.
